content: ahoy mateys yo ho ho and a pair of fingerless mitts perfect for helping to batten down the hatches preparing for cold weather or in remembering to ask the all important question - where s the rum chart options for the palm side include arrr a skull with cutlasses where s the rum or just a plain checkerboard **warning ** there are long yarn floats be sure to review ways to handle long floats so that you are comfortable working with this pattern **cascade heritage was used in the sample ** real black #5672 140 yds steel #5602 90 yds denim #5604 45 yds goldfusion #5734 10 yds *this pattern has been tech edited *
